name: 0wikipedia
description:
Türkiye'de wikipedia.org'a erişim yasaklandığı için insanların çoğu 0wikipedia.org alternatifine yöneliyor. Bu eklenti, Wikipedia linkine tıkladığınızda sizi otomatik olarak 0wikipedia.org adresine yönlendiriyor.

Turkey blocks access to wikipedia.org and many people are using 0wikipedia.org alternative to keep reading wikipedia articles. This extension automatically redirects you to 0wikipedia.org equivalent when you click on a Wikipedia link.

name: Artificial Intelligence to Genie in a Bottle
description: Changes the term "Artificial Intelligence" or "AI" to "Genie in a Bottle. Because news about AI are written in a way that makes it seem like a higher power. Works also in Finnish. Credit of the idea goes to my friend Lauri. Source at https://github.com/mikkoim/genie

name: 0T Reverse Image Search
description:
This add-on adds a drop down menu offering reverse image searches when an online image is right clicked.

There are no permission requirements.

Search Engines Available:
Google
Bing
Yandex
TinEye
SauceNao
IQDB

name: Wypl®
description:
Wypl est un assistant de navigation qui permet à l’internaute de protéger sa vie privée quand il navigue sur internet tout en recentrant la pertinence de ses recherches sur ses besoins réels par l’indexation d’un contenu personnalisé.

La solution est téléchargeable gratuitement par internet et s’installe facilement. Grâce à son intelligence embarquée, Wypl permet de minimiser l’utilisation des moteurs de recherche et d’en réguler la consommation. Moteurs qui font transiter par leurs serveurs l’ensemble des
données générées dans le cadre de leur utilisation, exposant les internautes à une utilisation de leurs données personnelles non conscientes et non autorisées d’une part les annonceurs à des frais de référencement exponentiels les plaçant sous une véritable dépendance et domination
économiques d’autre part.

De plus Wypl agira comme un pare-feu en empêchant l’accès aux données personnelles de l’internaute des programmes de tracking collecteurs de données privées.

L’assistance fournie par la Wypl permet à l’internaute d’avoir un contrôle accru sur son utilisation d’internet, tant dans ses recherches que sur la gestion de ses données personnelles.

name: 1 2 key for tab switch
description: Switch your Firefox tabs like in old Opera 12 Presto! Easily switch between tabs to the left or right using the ordinary keys 1 and 2.

name: 1-Click View Negative Ebay Feedback
description:
Click "1-Click Ebay Feedback" on any Ebay Auction or Ebay User page to view all of the seller's negative and neutral feedback.

ViewAllFeedback collects all of the Ebay feedback in the spot, even beyond 1 year, and displays potential issues. This helps ensure the item you are considering buying comes from a seller who has an acceptable reputation. Avoid problems ahead of time and look for red flags as past negative experiences can also happen to you in the future. Save time and money with 1 click (instead of Ebay's pages which may be 20+ pages long).

Addon uses 3rd party site (www.knowyourfeedback.com) for operation.

Privacy: No user information of your own is collected. Only history on the profile-of-interest is collected (and also this information is not stored for more than 1 day, and only in temporary memory). Information collected is all public on ebay user profiles (with no login required to view the ebay feedback). Our app simply makes the publicly available information easy to read in a 1-page list format.

eBay Inc. is a multinational e-commerce corporation, facilitating online consumer-to-consumer and business-to-consumer sales. It is headquartered in San Jose, California. eBay was founded by Pierre Omidyar in 1995, and became a notable success story of the dot-com bubble. Today eBay is a multibillion-dollar business with operations in about 30 countries.

The company manages eBay.com, an online auction and shopping website in which people and businesses buy and sell a broad variety of goods and services worldwide. In addition to its auction-style sales, the website has since expanded to include "Buy It Now" shopping; shopping by UPC, ISBN, or other kind of SKU number (via Half.com); online classified advertisements (via Kijiji or eBay Classifieds); online event ticket trading (via StubHub); and other services. It previously offered online money transfers (via PayPal, which was a wholly owned subsidiary of eBay from 2002 until 2015). The website is free to use for buyers, but sellers are charged fees for listing items after a limited number of free listings, and again when those items are sold.
